subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Kyle Busch drove to victory at Lowe’s Motor Speedway in Concord, N.C., in a Nationwide Series race. It was Busch’s fourth Nationwide victory this season and eighth over all spanning Nascar’s top three series.
snippet: Kyle Busch drove to victory at Lowe’s Motor Speedway in Concord, N.C., in a Nationwide Series race. It was Busch’s fourth Nationwide victory this season and eighth over all spanning Nascar’s top three series.
